Evaluations and formal\robservationsare designedtoencouragecommongoalsand tocomplywiththe state’sevaluationcriteriaanddistrict policies.Temporaryand\rprobationary teachers are evaluated annually and tenured teachers are evaluated every other year.\r\rEvaluations are conducted by site administrators
column3: who have been trained and certified for competency to perform teacher evaluations. Evaluation criteria\rincludes the following:\r•Engaging and Supporting all Students in Learning\r•Understanding and Organizing Subject Matter for Student Learning\r•Assessing Student Learning\r•Creating and Maintaining Effective Environments for Student Learning\r•Planning Instruction and Designing Learning Experiences for all Students\r•Developing as a Professional Educator\rThe district has adjusted its daily schedule to allow for 36 early release Wednesdays for staff development. The leadership team as decided to focus on\rSmall Group Reading Instruction and ELD as areas of focus. Staff meetings also provide for CAASPP training
